content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on i40 in albuquerque nm.  the sky was clear, no clouds. it was about 9:50am on 8/22/07. i was just getting to the coors exit when i looked up in the sky and saw 6 huge objects,  all white, all as big as a airplane, 3 on one side and 3 on the other forming a arrow.  one broke away from the pack then went back.  i looked down for 2 seconds to get my cell phone to take a picture and looked back and they were gone.  i have never seen anything like that.  it was like 6 white passenger airplanes flying in an arrow.  they looked like passenger airplanes without the wings.
content.summary: 6 objects,  all white, all as big as a airplane, 3 on one side and 3 on the other forming a arrow.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my 34 yr old son fishing for his birthday . we were heading north on the indian river when we saw it heading east . it was as bright as an arc welding light and appeared for just a few secs and disappeared just as fast as it appeared . in clear sky several miles from nearest cloud .It was moving quite fast, maybe 2x as fast as commercial airplane at similar altitude . i felt surprised but not alarmed . my family over the years have witnessed quite a lot of strange sights , nothing as elaborate as close encounters but still pretty amazing . i had a second sighting from my front yard in june of this year at 1230 pm . it appeared opaque and  very high in the sky . at first i thought it may be a weather balloon , but it zig zagged several times then complewtely changed direction back to where it was 1st seen . the week after i saw it again in same place making same maneuvers and going out of sight just like week before
content.summary: 2second streak of light

content.detailedDescription: Some powerful storms were going on on the 31st of march 2006. i went with my friend to castleton indiana (a surburb in northern indianapolis), and followed behind the storm. we were seeing some very neat lighting and decided to pull into a parking lot near the castleton square mall to view the lighting and allow the storm to pass a little more. suddenly we saw lights emerge from the clouds and saw three triangular shaped ships pass overhead very quickly. i got out of the car to look in the direction that the craft had taken, but they had disappeared. i noticed a light pattern on the underside of the craft that matched the triangular shape of the craft. i would have reported this incident much sooner, however i did not know where to report it.
content.summary: Three ufo flew overhead, triangle shaped with lights in a triangular pattern on the underside of the craft

content.detailedDescription:
This story was told to me by my mother.  i heard the story when i was young, and i asked her about it when she was in her 80's (1999).  this happened in the early 50's and i can't give a date.

one night in the early 50's she couldn't sleep.  she got up and sat by a window looking out (se).  she saw a large round light come down out of the sky and hover over a neighbors house.  it sat there for some time.  i asked her why she didn't wake my father, and she said i was just stairing at it.  then it just lifted up into the sky and vanished.

she said that in the local news paper (the daily republican) the next day there was a story about a man walking his dog.  the news paper story said that this guy was walking his dog in the middle of the night in mont clair, and he saw a bright light over hallmans hill (my parents neighborhood).  his discription was the same as my mother.  i guess people thought he was nuts, but to my mother it verified her story.
content.summary: Light in the sky hovering over a house

content.detailedDescription:
Though i'm not exactly sure of our age, i estimate my friend and i were between 7 and 9 years old.  we were playing in the street infront of his house.  he brought my attention to something he saw in the sky.  i looked were he was pointing.  directly above us and what appeared to be very high in the sky was a ring of light.  my not sure of the size of the ring, therefore i really can't tell how high it was; however, if you were to point to the sky, look to the end of your finger, and imagine a 5 to 3 centimeter ring of light in the sky, you can start to picture it.  i don't know what it was, but at the time i was going to a catholic school and this thing reminded me of a halo. 

what made it really weird was that this ring was pulsating.  this ring was expanding and contracting at a constant rate.  we weren't scared, we weren't excited, we were just confused.  why was there a pulsating halo in the sky?  after a few moments of bewilderment, we ran into the house to tell his older sister.  after a minute of trying to convince her to come outside, she reluctantly obliged. of course when we got back outside this thing was gone.  i don't know what it was, but i know what i saw.

thanks.
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed a pulsating ring of light

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my mother home between 9 and 10 pm.  i was driving down a winding road, cleared a curve, and ahead about 1/4 mile above and behind a stand of pine trees (edge of maclay gardens) was what looked exactly like the headlights of a jeep.  i mean the lights were as big as jeep headlights coming at you 20 feet away.  the lights were wobbling a bit and i thought it was moving forward, towards me.  my thought was "that plane is about to hit those trees."  i made a bend in the road and the lights were obscured for 1-2 second by trees.  when i had a clear shot again, the lights were dipping down behind the trees.  my car windows were closed, and when i saw the lights dipping i opened my window, but heard no sound. at that point i mentioned the lights to my mother, but she didn't see them.  i came to the end of the road, turned left and kept looking in my mirrors to see them again, but did not.  i have seen a few things that i wonder about, but this was was different, in that it was close and the lights were not small.  had it been a helicoptor or plane, i would have heard it and/or it would have crashed into the trees.
content.summary: Saw 2 bright headlight looking lights above and behind stand of trees

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i were sitting out front when we saw it coming from the north west at what appeared to be around twenty to thirty thousand feet high it was traveling faster than the commercial jets and lower. it continued on a south east course. i ran thru the house and grabbed my binoculars and went out to the back deck. as it went over head i could see it with the 
7x20 binoculars and it was just a round bright white light. no noise, no 
vapor trail nothing. it continued on the south east course until it went behind the trees.
content.summary: Extreme bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
Ok here's what happened. i'm not entirely sure this was a ufo sighting, but it seemed odd to me, and i have had a weird feeling about it since i saw it. better to report it and find out it was probably nothing, then not to report it and find out it really was something right? so here it is.

i'm walking home from a long walk, it was around 11, and i noticed a brite, starlike thing in the sky. i don't really know why but i just glanced up into the sky at that moment, and it caught my eye because it was moving. i thought for a moment it could be a plane, but dismissed the thought quickly as it looked exactly like one of the brightest stars. but it was moving, so i thought maybe it was a satellite...But then dismissed that thought because it was moving too fast to be a satellite. then, for some unknown reason, it stopped next to a star that kinda went from blue to green to red to white over and over (flashing) if you looked closely at it. it was smaller in size next to the star-like shape, and then all of a sudden, the starlike shape was gone. it had been there, and then not.
during this entire encounter i felt confused and a little scared though i can't say why. when it disapeared i thought for a moment maybe i just lost it and if i looked around it would be there, but it was no where. the whole thing kinda freaked me out, i started walking really quickly back to my house.

 it was very odd, and i don't know if it was a ufo but i thought it might be good to report. all this happened about 3/4 the way of the road hillside, between the school and my house, in otterburn park at around 11 o'clock at night.
content.summary: Far distance, moved quite swiftly, stopped at a star, disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work via westbound highway 4.  as i approached the merging traffic from the willow pass onramp (concord) - a bright light caught my attention off to the west near the concord airport.  typically, i see strobes from helicopters or departing aircraft from that area,  but like i said, those lights strobe and you can track them as they move in the direction of flight. i thought it was an aircraft at first, but when it didn't strobe and didn't move, i did a double take. 

the light was a whitish yellow and shaped like cat's eye (only instead of the points being vertical, they were horizontal).  it was stationary and it did not strobe. it was higher in the sky than the usual departing aircraft.  the center of the light was brighter than the outer edges.    

i did not see how it got there, it simply caught my attention by being a foreign object in my peripheral line of vision.  i've made this commute every day of every week for the last 10 years.  it took about 5 seconds for me to realize that this was not an aircraft from the airport.  the aircraft that fly in there are usually very small 4-6 passenger pipers and the occaisional private jet.  once i realized what it wasn't, i started wondering what it was and about 10 seconds later, it faded from the sky.  it didn't just blink off.  it faded to darkness like a heating element on the stove as it cools.  it never moved.  

i wasn't scared.  part of me was thinking, it's nothing ... then the other part of me was thinking - "no way, that was just way too weird".  i want to tell someone what i saw, but i'm afraid they'll make fun of me.  so i guess that's why i'm here. 

to answer the above re: the weather conditions:
it was dark outside, but i couldn't see the stars. considering my location and recent weather patterns, i'd say there was probably a high thin layer of fog.
content.summary: Cat's eye shaped bright light in the dark sky.  it appeared quickly and brightly then slowly dimmed.

content.detailedDescription:
i went outside that evening to get pictures of stars, planets. maybe a galaxy, by holding my digital camera to the lens of the telescope. i went into my backyard, into a dark spot, away from all lights. i wanted to get pictures of stars!
     i would point the telescope at an object, hold the camera up to the lens and shoot. there was no un-natural movement, not even a plane went overhead that night. after about 20 pictures, i came into the house to download the photos. 
     when i ran a slideshow, there were only two photos that were not black or blured. i went to the first one, it looked like a planet with and explosion off of the side... that left me scratching my head, i do not know what that was! the second picture , when i zoomed in on it, it took my breath away! i am sure that it is not nature made... it is not shaped like the iss. i do not think that it looks like a sattelite. none that i have ever seen! 
     i have sent the pictures to a few people that i believed would give be an idea of what i have, no response! i guess that i should have not expected one from nasa, space weather! could you please take a look and give me your opinion?
                                    thank you, 
                                    patty smith
content.summary: I was just taking pictures of stars

content.detailedDescription: So my dad was outside in the backyard making bbq when he looked up at a plain flying by, then he looked to the right an noticed a bright circular/unknown object near it. it looked way too high to be a blimp or a plain. so we went to the garage to get the binocular's to get a closer look. we couldnt figure out what it could of been, nothing a human could be in cause it seemed way to high to be anything piloted by a person. it made us frightened in a way casue it just seemed so strange and unknown.
content.summary: Sort of like a bright glowing blimp.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving on the 101 freeway going north,to the left of me was downtown l.A.To the right i believe would be the echo park area,with me in the car,front passenger,my mother and the rear seat behind my mom is my son. the traffic begin to come to a slow crawl as the sun now started to set,my mom to get my attention said' look" then she dipped her head down and covered her face with her right hand, now peeping to the left in my direction and when she said look! i did immediately look in the dirrection of which she had pointed in question.I now saw what appeared to be the eight wonder of the world, approximately five to seven hundred feet around, my first thought was wow! what a ferris wheel!And so beautiful'then i realized that this would be impossible for a ferris wheel to be so big and the whole world not know about it beeing here.I now was ever so amazed with great curiosity, i immediately started examining every detail in complete' aaaww! of this monstrossity' i am wittnessing,as it now begain turning slowly into horrizontal position, while coming even closer into my view, now i could see this is a space craft suspended in mid air at approximately three to four hundred feet in height, with windows all around it of every color and lots of people looking out the windows at me, with some in uniform of basic military type and color. the craft had a glair that surrounded it and exeded out to the whole perrimeter' to another one hundred feet or more,now looking at the top dome, bottom right corner there was writing in what looked like ancient hebrew or egyptian hyroglyphics, it was pure metal with the seems in tigth detail the color of golden bronze, wonderfully crafted with a great, great power coming from it that nothing could pennatrate. i also felt an extreme connection with the craft and its occupants as if somehow it was summonsed to find and awaken me to an unknown reality, as again i made eye contact with the craft and its occupants. the royal charriot then rose up into the heavens as quickly as it had appeared it now faded out of sight and disappeard. i have not been the same since my encounter,i will search until all is revealed to all. there is nothing hidden that should not be revealed. the truth is in me and i am in the world
content.summary: Five hundred ft. around exact to a ferris wheel and three hundred ft. heigth

content.detailedDescription: Was in our front yard when one small flashing object, smaller than an aspirin tablet, moved across the sky at a high rate of speed with no sound of an engine, mechanical etc. this object seem to by extremely high into the sky and had a bright single stobelike flash every one second. object flew around in a (large) circular pattern across the sky and within 30 seconds it had returned to the same location in the sw sky where it was originally spotted....And did this two other times. soon multiple (up to 8) of the same type of objects were spotted across various distances in the sw sky and seems to be in unison with the original; each taking their own second turn to flash a strobe like light. my initial reaction to seeing the object was a thought of unknown; never seeing an aircraft move so fast and with no sound to it. i started thinking about what would be in the sw sky, geographically that could be the answer. dayton is appox. 45 miles miles southwest of where i was, and wright patterson afb is in the suburban ne of dayton-greene county. this lead to my assumption that it was some type of craft being tested in rural sky, away from 'the lights' of dayton.
content.summary: Multiple fast moving circle objects with a one second per flash strobe

content.detailedDescription:
On new years eve 1999/2000, my wife and i went down to the mall in washington dc. the mall, being the area surrounding the washington monument more or less. there was a huge celebration planned for that night, featuring a concert with many big stars singing.
all kinds of vendors and stands, and of course fireworks at midnight to usher in the new millennium.
personally i thought it was very very cold that night, i remember my wife and i stating this several times that night.
although i don���t know what the official temp was i���ve heard several conflicting reports, so i have to go with the opinion of my frozen nose and toes���it was cold.. we arrived at the mall area by metro line roughly about 10:30pm and began walking around taking in some of the sights and searching for a good spot to stay where we could see the fireworks.
we did manage to catch some of celine dion's act as we went past where the concert was being held, but the entire area was packed full of people and getting anywhere near the stage was hopeless.
the mood of the crowd was generally happy, plenty of drinking and partying going on everywhere and only one instance of "violence" occurred that we noticed. anyway, there was a huge line waiting to get into the area near the reflecting pool and the police were searching people one by one for weapons and such.
which i suppose was a respectable idea--but not a very efficient one to say the least.
the police had erected a 4-foot high orange plastic fence all over to divide areas on the mall. a flimsy type of fence that you might see at a construction site to help control erosion. my wife and i waited in this line for about 20 minutes and still had not moved and had noticed everyone complaining about the cold and how slow the police were in searching people.
suddenly we heard a rather loud ripping sound, then the sound of people cheering and police yelling through bullhorns--for a minute we did not understand what was going on, but then like fans at a ball game doing "the wave",
we could see everyone, and i mean everyone, tearing the fence down and storming out onto the area behind the short fence onto the reflecting pool where already many people already were watching the concert unfolding. at this point naturally, the police threw up 
there hands in frustration and walked to there squad cars not even attempting to stop anyone--i assume for fear of a riot.
    even though things got crazy for a few minutes, all in all as far as i know no one was injured and it seemed everyone was having a great time
and surely had a memorable night. my wife and i continued to walk on and finally decided to stop near a bridge to watch the fireworks. as we waited for midnight we talked together about things
that we had endured over the past year and kind of had an "overlook" at our lives to date; it was a very surreal (?) moment, as if time had stopped, 
i guess it was just one of those strange moments two people in love might have--enough of my reminiscing on to the events that undoubtedly changed me
forever.

    midnight, on the dot, a thousand screaming streaks of sparkling chaos erupted up into the freezing sky and blossomed into a maelstrom of intense fire of muti-faceted colors.
the fireworks display was one of the best i had ever seen in the many years of my dc habitation--witness to over 20 years worth of fourth of july���s
down on the mall, to this day i still say it was the best display i have ever been a part of. they wondrous display of explosive mayhem lasted full steam ahead for about 15 minutes i believe.
after the last streaking missile of falling embers died away in the midnight sky, my wife and i began to walk to the metro to start on our dreaded journey home, as we knew there would be mobs of people 
joining us as well. as we approached the metro escalator ( i believe it was the foggy bottom station) we saw a group of officers blocking the entrance stating we all had to wait as even the train operators had been given permission to come topside to watch the 
fireworks and were currently enroute back to the trains to take us all home. i later found out that there were over 1 million people that attended the celebration on the mall that night--i cannot put into words how many people that is when you 
are right in the middle of such a huge mass of humans. again we waited in the cold night, and people began to huddle together for warmth which really surprised me--people were very happy and helping each other,
i must say i am a cynical person, skeptical, and sometimes dare i say bitter--sometimes my faith in humanity is somewhat jaded. that night shocked me and actually gave me a sliver of hope that one day it could be possible for mankind to be able to call one another brother.

    as everyone talked while waiting for the police to let us down into the subway tunnels, my attention was called to a young man who had plenty to drink that night no doubt, who climbed a small tree nearby and was singing and generally making people laugh at his antics. 
suddenly i heard a loud snap, i turned back to the man in the tree just in time to see the branch he was standing on break and he plummeted to the ground with a thud. he was helped back up and he cheered and the entire crowed laughed even more.
that���s when i saw it. i saw...A blimp...Yes it must be a blimp. then i notice people pointing, just a few at first, then more and more, and a hush fell over the crowd. the
silence and quiet mumbling between people was a sign i decided, as all night the roar of the crowd had been constant.
i looked back at this "blimp" i had seen in the distance. more and more people were pointing and now a few people shouted like the grade school game of "telephone" as the message was carried off through the crowd "look at that! what is that!?"
then i noticed 2 more "blimps" identical to the first. all three were cylindrical in shape and had several lights shining on them. one of them shone a very bright "spotlight" down on the ground. i could not see what it was shining on,
as they were some distance away from my wife and i--perhaps 300 yards? maybe more. these
"blimps" were traveling slowly across the sky and they were quite large, i���m a bit afraid to guess how large because they were far from us and i don���t remember a reference point--it was a bit exciting and i was 
not thinking about "measure the size--is this north over here? what is the relative speed estimation etc" i was in a speechless state.
   the next thing i saw was someone pointing up and screaming "look up there!", i saw about 20 triangle shaped "aircraft" flying in a mass like a group of gnats on a hot summer day--yet these things were very quick and nimble.
each had 3 lights on them, one in the middle and one on each tip. as my wife and i watched they began to fly in different patterns. people began to call out things, such as, "those are seagulls not ufo's" and i was thinking to myself they were stunt kites.
i even remember my wife turning to me and asking what i thought they were, and i told her they were just stunt kites and told her i had seen them before at the beach.
suddenly the objects began flying in a tight circle very fast and then shot out at incredible speed and disappeared. then about 2 seconds later they flew right back into the circle pattern facing each other and stopped, hovered for a second then formed two groups each group in a line,
they formed the line two at a time, one from each group until they were all in a straight line facing each other began to zigzag across each other.
at that moment i knew i was not witnessing stunt kites. i was amazed. people had cheered after each little stunt that was performed. the objects were very close and i would say
roughly about 100' up above us. it was the most amazing thing i had ever seen. as far as i know, no country in the world has an aircraft that can move at those incredible speeds, stop on a dime, and be so graceful.
i have seen the blue angels fly when i was a kid, they are graceful, but even a fighter jet needs some room to build up speed--whatever it was that i witnessed that night did not need any room at all--it achieved tremendous speeds from a dead stop.
after about 5 minutes even the police were watching these crafts flying--they suddenly started ushering people down into the subway, but they continued to watch. every now and then a craft would swoop down within i would estimate 20 feet of the ground
and that seemed to make the police really nervous. for some reason my wife and i started laughing hysterically. a few young ���college ���aged��� guys walked over to where these craft were swooping down to and one guy reached his hand up as high as he could to try and touch one as they came streaming down towards the ground. after about 3 ���crafts��� swooping down, the guy turned and starting ���whooping��� to his friends and ���flexing������he had actually touched one of them! then 4 or 5 police officers that where next to the subway escalators started yelling loudly at the guys ���get back now! get away from there!��� my wife and i also commented on how the police were frozen in place and not moving from there ���safe��� distance, hehe. but then suddenly one officer did in fact, run over and grab the one, obviously drunk kid, and pull him away-- at the same time pushing his few friends back into the crowd as well. when they came close to us again, my wife grabbed the police officer and asked/yelled(as it was relatively loud)��� what are those things?���. when the officer turned to my wife i got frightened for a second, his eyes were so big, it was obvious to me he was terrified, all he could say was ���i���i don���t know miss, please, everyone needs to leave the area immediately!��� and then proceeded to start yelling to the crowd telling them to disperse immediately.
  then i really got a scare, the craft started to dart into different directions very close to the edges of the crowd, then shot back up into the area above the crowd again and continued circling. i feel i must also note that when they did their dives and swoops, you could hear the crafts traveling through the air���like the actual wind resistance. similar to swinging a baseball bat or a stick -how you can hear it ���swoosh��� through the air. other then that noise, we did not hear any sort of motor of electrical noise of any sort. when one of the craft came down it swooped down about a foot off the ground then shot up at an angle to about 4 feet high and stopped, right in front of the crowd edge where my wife and i were (among thousands of others mind you) for approximately 1 second, before flipping over itself up and back into the formation above the crowd again. at that moment i thought for sure i was going to be hit by a ufo at one million miles an hour! but it stopped about 2 feet from me���i could feel the air from it. i could see right inside at the pilot���.
(my wife an i compared notes later on without telling each other���instead we told her grandparents separately and then all sat down in the living room and her grandparents confirmed our descriptions to be the same)
 suddenly i heard the loudest "boom" and then some other explosions, i thought they were more fireworks but didn���t see anything in the sky except the ufo's. a few people had screamed when the explosion went off--i believe it was not fireworks. why? because we had just witness a good 15-20 minutes of fireworks and none of them were that loud and i didn���t hear anyone scream when the fireworks went off. from this "assumption/theory" i don���t believe it was fireworks, but have no proof of what it might have been.
the explosions only lasted a few seconds and then i heard a helicopter. suddenly the flying triangles disappeared.... i didn���t see if they vanished or flew away but i believe they just vanished. then i saw 3 helicopters fly by to the area where the triangles had been, but continued on there flight path, and no sooner did the helicopters disappear from sight the triangles zipped back above us from every direction and the crowd cheered.
  one guy next to me smiled and said in a drunken glee "the government can���t stop our party with the aliens, they can���t even catch them!"
after about 10 minutes i noticed another strange event. a man in a business type suit came up from the subway while hordes of people were slowly
going down into the subway. everyone parted for him to pass by, but he walked right into the crowd of us (remember 1 million people were here) and as he walked by my wife and i he smiled and asked "if we were having a good time" my wife chimed in "yes a fantastic time, look up at the ufo's" and she pointed at the 20 or so "stunt craft". the man smiled at her, looked up at them, then back at us and said,
"yes they just want to join the fun" then he slowly continued his walk through the middle of the massive crowd saying hello to people and even shaking a few peoples hands.
i watched him until he disappeared into the crowd, finding something about him a bit "off" whereas my wife had gone back to watch the flying triangles again.
looking back now, one thing i noticed was that this man was wearing a business suit.
well this is washington dc no big deal right? right. except that it���s january 1, and its freezing!!! yet the cold did not seem to bother this man at all.
well, i have no proof he was anything other then a man celebrating new years, so i suppose i should just write him off as a business man who had enough drink to keep himself warm. i mean they were only 20 ufo's flying over his head and he acted like it was no big deal, just an everyday occurrence.
   my wife and i watched the ufo's for a total of roughly 35 minutes, and finally she began to tug at my arm and said ���maybe we should leave now?���
and so we decided that we were lucky to witness one of the most important events in all history ever, but if we froze to death it wouldn���t matter much
 and we wouldn���t be able to tell the story to our children one day (she was pregnant at the time),so we went home with an unbelievable story.

(i cant believe more people have not come forward, there were thousands of witnesses! belial418@msn.Com)
content.summary: Visitors to the dc new years celebration 2000

content.detailedDescription:
Hi.  i'm the same guy that reported the black triangular near rt 104 in princeton a while back.

so, i'm here  in my bedroom and hear a low rumbling sound.  i know the sound from the past sighting.

i slip on my clothes and go out.  two black triangular shaped crafts flew over my property, going back south-east, across rt 104.

when i got out on my porch, they were going across rt 460 flying back, well, if you go in that direction they were heading, you'd go towards danville virginia.

are we being invaded?  i never saw any of the black triangular shaped crafts before.  i only heard of them.

now, not only did i see one.  i've seen two at the same time, flying in formation.

it's really weird.
content.summary: Two black triangular shaped crafts

content.detailedDescription:
This one seen very clear by optical vision and then started recording by the video camera panasonic type nv-vs 5.The total recording time was one hour and half on one tape.The opject was in very high altitude in the sky and the weather was very very fair.Noticed also,and recorded on the tape one airliner minutes before recording the object and the second airliner was during recording time ,both airplanes were headed to cairo international airport and were preparing for landing.It was no single affect to the airplanes.That is not the first time ufo's were headed in its route to saqqara steps pyramid ,as recorded before in many cases.
the route and direction of the ufo was from east to west , but from higher altitude to lower altitude.
due to cms acceptance only three photos i have to send my report three times in order to send 9 important photoes of the different shapes of the object.Thanks with by best wishes from egypt.

Telepathic contact with extraterrestrials.  no craft seen.

content.detailedDescription:
It was dark charlie got out of the truck to open the gate. it appeared over head he drew his gun.And was scared stiff.Like the gun would have helped.Trent never got out of the truck.The triangle lights went out one buy one and then it vanished. the guys were so scared they didnt speak all the way home..They didnt want to tell anyone either for fear of being ridiculed or called crazy. these guys grew up together. one works for hastings in the buisness building in amarillo and well charlie had a home health care buisness but started doin drugs heavily and is now serving a small stent in prison.Charlie was never the same after the incident. he had rented that lease for years hunting and fishing and never returned after that. the lease was out in the middle of nowhere miles from civilization. you could easily get lost on it with out a map from the owner. i seen several silver ships so many i couldnt count they went on further than my eyes could see i also had binoculars. i pointed them out on a visit earlier but no-one really cared ..Until they were on top of them. i still want to go back but you have to pay a year in advance to get on the lease. im sure you could still go on. the worst that could happen is youd be asked to leave. and im sure the cowboy livin on it would escort you to the pond area if you are not fishing or hunting. you will need an escort cause you will and can get lost. im really interested in knowing if they are still in the area. i wanted to drive till i got closer to them , i was pissed they disappeared so fast. my chance to see them better vanished. one sec they are there the next there gone!!! i really want to go back. they peaked my intrest, you dont believe until you see one for yourself, i always liked the thought of there being other people from other planets. i know there are people from other planets now. why is the government hiding them. and what are they doin. in the middle of nowhere. hunting and fishing? (:
                                                tammy t
content.summary: Appeared over us out of nowhere while crossing a cattle guard

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside and was looking at the stars when i noticed two star like objects moving across the sky from the north heading south. i called to my daughter to come out and look.  we watched the two star like objects then we noticed what seemed to be a jet which came from the north also, heading after them.  we also noticed another plane coming from the south heading toward the two star like lights.  as the planes neared the star like lights, the star like lights just disappeared.  it was like someone had flipped a switch, one second the two lights were there, then their lights were gone.  the planes kind of circled where the lights had been, then the planes continued heading south.  my daughter had tryed to take a picture of the star like lights but  was unable to.
content.summary: Two unknown objects in the sky over wocott, vermont, with two planes

content.detailedDescription: It was 12:45 am, on 07/30/07 with a partly cloudy sky, some stars out and a full moon. the location is malvern, arkansas.    i was at home  and i decided to go outside to enjoy the warm night and the full moon and sky/stars.  i was out for about 5 minutes when to my left in the sky, with about a 30 to 40 degree line of sight up, i noticed a very rapidly blinking light, the reason i noticed it was because it was blinking like crazy, it was just a little bit bigger than a star and blinking like wild, it was traveling across the sky to the left and was not staying in any kind of straight line, it made several erratic moves and then did one very wild move, it moved in then out and up and around and then back down and around the same way, it was almost like it followed the pattern of a horseshoe, after that it went behind a cloud and there it stayed, i watched for it to come out the other side or back up the same way but it never did, it stayed behind the cloud.  i was pretty excited by then and was watching the sky for it, then another light to the right of where the one went behind the clouds....And i don't mean right next to it, it was across the sky a good distance and moving to the left in the same direction as the other one did, about the same height in the sky as the other one, it too was blinking rapidly, it was also flying erratic, no horseshoe moves but nothing like  a plane or helicopter would fly, it traveled across the sky and i watched it, i could make out a few other colors of lights in this one but mainly it looked like a very bright white light, blinking like crazy....Almost id to the other one, this one went behind the same cloud and disappeared also.  i was pretty excited by then, i've never seen anything like this in my life before.  sure, i've seen a few odd and end things in the sky before, but nothing can i say i've ever seen that looked like this did, or acted like this did.  i stayed out a little while longer and watched the sky but never saw anything else, i never saw these two light's emerge from behind the cloud either.  i came back in and wrote down what i saw so i wouldn't get things mixed up or forget or remember something i didn't see. my first impression of it was that it was a ufo, it wasn't a plane i knew because i've seen planes before in the night sky.  i thought long and hard about it, there's no way this was a plane of any kind, plus i've seen planes in the night sky before, this wasn't a plane and it wasn't a helicopter.  there was no sound emitted from the objects/lights.  it wasn't a star, it wasn't a satellite, and it wasn't a weather balloon, flare or anything like that...It moved too erratic to be anything i know of,  plus i thought it was interesting that i saw the one, then i saw the second one and they both went behind the same cloud. i didn't get any pictures because i didn't have a camera with me, and i was really amazed at the whole event and didn't think of going to get my camera, plus it happened so fast i wouldn't of been able to go back and get the camera from the house and come back in time to capture anything.
content.summary: I was out star watching and saw two erratic moving star like, blinking very rapidly objects moving across the sky and hide behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my patio (garden apartment-middle level) around 9:10 pm checking on my cat.  saw what was definitely a plane to the north - heard the plane but it had a larger light than i'm used to seeing.  looked straight out and up into the sky (this would be to the northwest) just looking for the big dipper.  

high up, where a large plane might pass over the city rather than land, i watched as two lights came from the northwest.  initially assumed it was two planes but thought it odd that one was following the other so exactly and closely even being so high up.  

the two lights moved steadily toward me.  at some point i realized it was not two planes but one, large object.  i can't tell you how high up it was but would now guess it was considerably lower than a commercial plane but higher than most small planes.  the distance between the two lights, to me, seemed to be several football fields - at least more than two.

there was a white light at the front and a white light at the end.  when i first noticed them i actually thought they were stars until it was very clear that they were moving, and in exact unison.  the light was very bright but not at all large.  it didn't blink as a plane's light might or flicker or twinkle as a star might.  

there was no mechanical sound heard.  it maintained a steady speed but not at all fast.  it just seemed to move along at a speed i might drive on a city street.

by the time i realized what i was seeing it was too late to grab my camera.  no other neighbors were around.  i would have tried to call to someone if i had realized sooner that this wasn't a normal object.  i was surprised with myself as i wasn't scared or nervous but curious as i watched.  i think i wanted to prove that it was just a plane or blimp or something i knew.  after the object went over my building i realized how significant the experience was and wondered who to share it with.  

while i'm somewhat a skeptic when it comes to ufos, i just know, for sure, what i "saw" tonight was not a plane.
content.summary: Saw 2 lights, first thought 2 planes one following exactly behind, instead 1 large object!

content.detailedDescription: while going to work in late october, just before going back to standard time, i was going over the walnut creek split with a clear over view of the san ramon valley and the north and west facing of mt. diablo when i viewed a large spotlite coming down the west face of the mountain. with the angle of decent it was taking i new right of this was no helicopter; and its lack of speed meant no plane. so as i head south bound on 680 i keep my eye on it. as it got to the valley it turned north bound, coming my way. i was driving a mid 70's chevy with a moon roof. not a sun roof of glass, but a solid movable steel moon roof. i hit the button and opened the roof up.A 3ft.X3ft. opening. as it went directly over me i couldn't help but notice first, the tube light outline of a airline jet underneath a larger round disc that blocked out the stars. no way was this a f---'n jet. as it went over me it turned 45 degrees and headed towards the golden gate. still south bound 680 just before the town of alamo i notice second object over san ramon valley road over the town of danville. on each side of the round center unit were largescreens the size of billboards with lights of red and blue on top. it headed down the valley until i lost sight of it around the sunol grade. when i took the crow canyon turn off, i came to red lights at crow canyon road. i looked east when i noticed moving lights above san ramon hospital making the international pattern for nuclear power. as you can well imagine, thats a lot to take in before my morning coffee. all i could do was shake my head and figure, who's gonna believe it. light was just breaking over the vasco area when the light turned green, and i went for that coffee.    thanks for your ear.
content.summary: three different objects along 680 corridor between 242 and 580

content.detailedDescription: My youth theatre supervisor,katie, was giving me a lift back from the hall where we do drama, as we'd just got back from edinburgh. we were in huyton by st georges playing fields, at the traffic lights on longview road. katie looked out of the left window and seen 2 long lights and a round blue light spinning with a round red light. she told me, and i seen it, but the weird thing was, it wasnt going across or anything, it was just dropping from the sky. it was really quickly just falling. as we got to the traffic lights by huyton lane, it had just disappeared. we carried on driving, and we were looking for it. we got onto hurst park drive, and i looked out of the right window and seen it slowly rising. i told her, but as she looked, it zoomed very quickly to the left, then zoomed just as quick to the right, but slightly diagonal. then just shot down, behind houses. it was in the distance, so i don't think it would have been that low, it just disappeared behind the houses because it was far away and dropping. me and katie just looked at each other, and we went out of our way and searched for it. we couldn't find it again, but we were searching for about 20 minutes. we just wanted to know what it was, we were so confused and freaked out, it was scary.
content.summary: "ufo" dropped from sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch -- i've been watching evening iss passings all month...I just happened to look up, and i saw approximately a dozen, very faint, but visible nonetheless, star-like objects -- all exactly identical in size, speed and brightness -- moving in a very tight formation, at what appeared to be a very high altitude and a very high rate of speed.  they travelled from north to south.  i observed for at least 6 seconds, maybe 7, before they faded-out (the same way satellites do).

no power plant noise.  no red or green lights.  racing faster than i had ever seen any other satellite.  very bizarre.

formation was irregularly shaped: shaped like a triangle, but with more "stars" on the right side of the formation, with several trailing.  no streaks, sparks, or other detritus.

i called all major (and minor) news stations in the area, along with police and sheriff's departments (i even woke up a public affairs guy from norad in colorado -- i somehow got the guy's home number -- he was in bed when i called him) -- but nobody had heard of any ufo reports.

i am prior military (intelligence) and i know my aircraft ids.  never seen anything like this.  absolutely amazing.

even if i had had a video camera, the formation (like a shotgun pattern) was too faint and too fast to have been able to pick up.  whatever it was, norad must have picked it up (somebody out there knows what it was)...
content.summary: Irregular formation of faint star-like objects; high-altitude/rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: Four of us were traveling (by boat) south on the north end of long lake in northern wisconsin.  we saw a ball of light just above the horizon it was traveling east.  the ball then split into five balls the four trailing balls were slightly smaller then the lead ball.  all were evenly spaced.  within a minute they just vanished.
content.summary: Ball of light splits in to five balls then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
While working in qatar between 1996 and 1999 i used to go running in the desert behind my residence.  i used to run most evenings and most days.  my work meant i was out there for about 2.5y so i was very familiar with as an area of about a 5 to 6 mile radius.  my runs took me past a series of buildings and then to an area of the desert that stone, brick and other markers were used to identify plots of approximatly 100m square which eventially gave way to the subka-desert beyond.  the 'normal' run area was bound by a road to an electrical substation at the bottom, a gas pipeline under a raised section to the left (probably west) and the start of the e ringroad in the east.  

one evening something appeared in a very strange place, in view of the nearest building, but hidden from all the roads.  it was on the nearest side of a small rise.
  
the next bit of this trys to explain as best i can what occured next and sounds a little odd so bear with me!  

i am not even sure that it registered with me that it was there origially because it resisted both recognition and visual review.  over a period of time (probably a week or so) i fought to look at it from a distance of over 100m(possibly more).  i am not too sure how long it was actually there but it was probably the best part of a month, and over this time i gradually broke the mental barriers down to eventually manage to run around it (again at at least 100m distance).  the following description is the summation of half-looks and a gradually formed picture.  the 'thing' was silver, such that it reminded me of the final section of a building recently constructed on the far side of the e ringroad.  i did suspect at one point that it was some kind of optical illusion and was in fact the top of the building.  it seemed to be circular (though i could only see it from a side elevation), and it was at a slight angle to the horizontal, a similar angle to the rise but not evidently the same angle (i know its odd).  it was not supported by any visible structure but was clearly some 3 to 4ft off the ground, and to be located where it was would have been excessively difficult because of the immendatly surronding terrain.  there were much easier places to put it if there had been a choice, and, for instance a crane had been used or a trailor.  the object actually looked a little like a 'traditional' saucer being raised in its central section, but it also had raised areas, almost as high as the centre section, some were definatly square but others were less easy to identify, all were solidly attached, and all were silver seeming continuous with the rest of the surface.  there were no obvious seams or windows or entrances.  it diameter was probably 35 to 45ft and its height at the centre was probably 20-25ft.  i would not describe it as aerodynamic.

then one day i realised the object had gone, i am not too sure i noticed the precise day it left but it took me about a week after the realisation to go and have a look in detail at the area.  this, even after this time, took a lot of  determination and for some weeks after i was very uneasy about the area.  there had been no rain or winds to hide anything but there was absolutly no trace of the object, its supporting structure, or the possiblility of it having been take away on a trailor or similar.  i also checked against areas i knew had been used and confirmed this observation.

during this time it never crossed my mind to tell anybody else (it was almost as though i forgot it was there when i left its immediate presence and there was a deep reluctance to even consider it) and unusually i did not see anybody else in the area (which upon reflection was probably even more strange).  the only reason i even remembered this incident was because i wrote the first account about a week after it dissappeared.  this whole incident was forgotten until sometime in 2002/3 when something on the radio (to do with hitchikers guide) brought it back to me and i looked and found a copy.  the odd thing is that i actually forgot the whole incident completly inbetween and it was only the accout that allowed me to recall.  

i cannot explain the object but it is as much the surreal aspect of the whole episode that worries me to this day.  just to clarify i did not see anything or anybody anywhere near the object and as mentioned earlier i seemed to be the only person around which was unlikely.

the actual location is about 1 mile from the end of the airport runway!
content.summary: I  struggled to observe an object on the ground over a period of about a month.  silver colour, disc shaped, about 3-4ft above the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness stepped off public transportation and looked to the sky while walking to the parking lot of where his car was parked.  he noticed a dark grey object hovering/floating at about 250 feet above his head.  he removed a sony dcr-hc38 40x handycam from his bag that he always carries with him and captured the attached video.

the object was spherical in shape and with the naked eye appeared and faded only to reappear a short distance away.  the witness stopped filming long enough to turn the auto focus off and change the camera to "infinity" setting.  during those few seconds, the object had moved to about 1,500 feet away.  he captured a few more seconds of tape before the object disappeared completely into the distance.

the witness reports that he saw no unusual features about the object other than it was spherical, about 2 to 3 feet in diameter, dull finish.
content.summary: Dark grey sphere floating appearing disappearing and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in our front yard, on the north side of the house, enjoying a clear, starlit sky that included the milky way slightly to the east and overhead.  facing west, my attention was turned upward to movement in the sky at what would be approximately 260-265 degrees on a compass rose.  i looked up to see, at an angle of about 30 degrees, two bright lights (brighter than any of the stars then visible) approaching me at a very high rate of speed, descending in a "swooping" motion much like a military aircraft on a strafing run.  it was as if the lights were on the opposite forward wing tips of an aircraft, but there was nothing between them to block out the background sky/stars.  i immediately saw that the lights were rotating clockwise (as they appeared to me), as if an airplane were in a roll to its left.  there was no sound whatsoever, but it was very clear that whatever they were, they were headed directly at me, on a glide path (if one can call it that) that was rapidly closing, and i experienced the momentary fear that i might be under attack. as i watched its approach, i called to my girlfriend, who was in the hosue, to come out.  after about one-and-a-half revolutions of the "object(s)", it/they suddenly stopped moving towards me; the light that was then at the top of the circle they were describing broke off and headed east, still at a high rate of speed (much faster than the satellite we observed a few minutes later), while the second, lower, light "parked" where it was.  by now my girlfriend had joined me, and we both watched as the first light streaked across the sky eastward.  as it approached the center peaked portion of our roof, we moved several steps to the east to pick it up visually on the other side of the peak; it never reappared.  when we looked back to the location where the second light had stopped, it, too, was gone.  neither of us heard any sound or felt any phyhsical sensations at any time during the event, but we were both amazed at what we had seen. i, especailly, was taken by the event, as i had seen much more of it.  i am still wondering what i saw, of course; there was and is a mix of feelings, from fear that this might be some sort of an attack to wonder at the incredible precision of the movements and speed at which they took place.  i never dreamed that i would personally witness such a thing, but, in retrospect, it was an amazing, enjoyable experience (enjoyable once i realized it was not an attack, of course), and i'll never forget it.
content.summary: Very high-speed "swooping" lights that approached, separated, then vanished
